extendedInfo.description: To purchase this app, please search for 'nciku chinese dictionary' in Google Play.If you donât have access to paid Google Play apps, then visit our website at tool.nciku.com/androiddictionaryThis app is actually identical to the new app in every aspect except the name, and will continue to be updated at the same time as the new version. We changed it because the package ID of the old app was based on the outsourcing company that made the original (and very buggy) version of the nciku dictionary, and this canât be changed even though the app has been completely rewritten.NOTES:  - You will have to re-download the dictionary data after installing this update. This is a very large file (>100MB) so please connect to WiFi before updating - Unless you re-download the data file, the updates don't delete the words in 'My Viewed Words'.Previous versions:3.3: Split-screen view for tablet mode; Automatic search for pinyin when there are no matching âwordsâ results; Theme Words & Conversations from the nciku website, with audio pronunciation for conversations; Automatically search for selected text in your clipboard; Improved result order in meaning search3.2: sentence mode, pre-built HSK and CET vocab lists3.1: entry/example audio, voice search3.0: handwriting, stroke animations, example search, flashcards etc

reviews.title: nciku
reviews.comment: This would be a very helpful app if it would just work as described.  It shows no pinyin spelling or pronunciation as I enter English words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worse than their free app and web page.
reviews.comment: There are better alternatives. Not recommended. With such a great web page, even if it\'s a bit slow, surprising that they produce such a crap app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very usefull but not quite fit Galaxy Tab screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Disappointing, as a dictionary hanping is much better. The character input is hopeless. The one good thing is it gives sample sentences for context
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not yet refined
reviews.comment: It has not yet been refined. As soon as I begin to type on the interface keyboard the app crashes. I can use the other functions, but without the ability to type a software based dictionary is a farce.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Slow on my phone, crashes sometimes  Still usefule to make flashcards
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of money.
reviews.comment: It\'s very glitchy. It stacks all the time. I cannot make it work properly. Please fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Animations are fuzzy on my large screen skyrocket. Other than that perrrfect!  Love the site and app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app. Update makes it worth the money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had no problem with crashes/bugs. Fast, responsive and excellent dictionary (better than CEDICT based ones). Recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Awesome website, but the app just doesn\'t work! It gets stuck as soon as I start it!! Don\'t purchase it yet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How do I get a refund?
reviews.comment: I tried it and it was constantly crashing my Android Motorola Droid... I tried to get a refund but NCIKU does not seem to care or offer customer service?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super handy
reviews.comment: I used this app like a fiend while in Taiwan. Definitely got my moneys worth out of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty buggy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thought it would be a good alternative/compliment to hanping Chinese dict. Unfortunately, this app is worth nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Stroke order not working on N1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: no copy&paste from&into email, SMS, etc. I use Hanping&\346\234\211\351\201\223\350\257\215\345\205\270 to translate&compose chinese SMS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sad to say, new version does not work.guys fix it please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not download as an autonomous app. Beware relying on their secondary download instructions- hard to understand and I have still not managed it
reviews.author: A Google User
